attributes.action: Ban Donald Trump, from entering the UK, due to his support for far-right groups.
attributes.additional_details:
The retweets by Trump of the Britain First videos only help legitimise racism and hatred towards Muslims. Britain First is a vile racist party with a long history of extremism and Islamophobia, some of it criminal. 

Ban Trump from entering the UK and send a clear message. 

NO to hatred. NO to racism. You are a dangerous incompetent disgrace. You are not welcome here!

If Trump was allowed into the country, the ONLY reason should be to charge him with inciting racial hatred.
attributes.background:
In retweeting Britain First posts, it is clear that President Trump promotes and supports the ideas of a racist and fascist party.  Ban Trump from entering the UK and send a clear message. 
NO to hatred. NO to racism. You are a dangerous incompetent disgrace. You are not welcome here!
